item.title: Bangalore to Kovalam Solo Trip Plan
item.description: Solo trip from Bangalore to Kovalam offers a perfect blend of relaxation, beach vibes and cultural experiences. Here's a suggested itinerary for your solo trip: Route Bangalore -> Salem -> Madurai -> Tirunelveli -> Nagercoil -> Kovalam Bangalore to Kovalam Departure from Bangalore Start your journey early in the morning to make the most of your day. item.title: Bangalore to Madurai Solo Trip Plan
item.description: Solo trip from Bangalore to Madurai can be a fascinating journey, rich in history, culture and spirituality. Madurai, often referred to as the Athens of the East, is famous for its Meenakshi Amman Temple and vibrant street life. item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K

item.title: Bangalore to Kanyakumari Solo Trip Plan
item.description: Solo trip from Bangalore to Kanyakumari can be a fascinating journey, as you'll get to experience the diverse landscapes, cultural heritage and the meeting point of the Arabian Sea, the Indian Ocean and the Bay of Bengal. Here's a suggested itinerary for your trip: Route Bangalore -> Salem -> Madurai -> Kanyakumari -> Salem -> Bangalore Day 1: Bangalore to Madur
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K

item.title: Bangalore to Rameswaram (3 Days + 2 Nights, Trip Plan)
item.description: Three days Trip from Bangalore to Rameswaram to Bangalore, If you are a Couple riding on Bike or You are a Family driving in Car, then this three days plan works very well.
